app.description: Name of the application under test as defined in angular.json. If not set, defaultProject will be used.
app.x-prompt: Name of the application under test as defined in angular.json? Empty means defaultProject.

overwrite.description: Should existing e2e test folder be overwritten.
overwrite.x-prompt: Should existing e2e test folder be overwritten?

folder.description: Path of e2e test folder to be used as installation destination. if not set, the destination folder will be derived from target app folder.
folder.x-prompt: Should existing e2e test folder be overwritten? Empty means, it will derived from target app folder.
